TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: Release it, release it, release it, release it!!!!!!

So,Im not very informed about update,We are able to keep our save right? I mean not the crafts but,science and funds? Or I better start to new save.

You'd be better off starting a new game.

If you want to transfer something specific, like an asteroid on the orbit, then you'd probably be better off manually editing the save game file.

But in general - old saves should work. Just beware that game balance might be off.

Last number is just in: 2,976.19 microfortnights per 360,000,000,000 shakes

How many clicks per centon is this?

How many clicks per centon is this?

Sir now YOU do the waiting!
Refresh madness in 3... 2...
mmmmmboy I hope it's released today. Watching everyone on Twitch play it has turned my hype dial to 11.

"Said I'd stay up for five minutes and that ended up being an hour. Tomorrow's gonna be a good one. ;)" -Maxmaps Twitter

Maxmaps is excited, so am i!

"Said I'd stay up for five minutes and that ended up being an hour. Tomorrow's gonna be a good one. ;)" -Maxmaps Twitter

Maxmaps is excited, so am i!

That post was already 9h ago!

Maybe in a few hours, we all have to leave the hypetrain at station .25 and go over to the "is this mod working in 0.25" train

*silently eats a Duna bar while the srbs he duct taped to the back fire full blast running on hype*

SPAAAAAAAAACEEEEE!!!
As it all seems so close now I'm finally allowing myself to HYPE!

This is the first release I am actually waiting in the forums to get as soon as its released rather than waiting a day. (Playing since 0.18)

Hype is the only thing keeping me going!

*silently eats a Duna bar while the srbs he duct taped to the back fire full blast running on hype*

SPAAAAAAAAACEEEEE!!!

Duna Bars. FOR SCIENCE!
my random guess is 12 noon EST

my random guess is 12 noon EST

I'm putting my monopoly money on about 4pm

I'm putting my monopoly money on about 4pm

Nonsense. You are only saying that because that's when they always release updates...
Spare a thought for the UK KSP players!
I know, I have been on the forums since 9am GMT catching up on some old posts

Somebody was guessing that it will be released today since Squad likes to release updates on Tuesdays (that way they don't have to do devnotes). Following that logic, since devnotes are usually posted around 7:00 pm MDT (1:00 am UTC on Wednesdays), 0.25 will be released at...

7:00 pm MDT today (Tuesday). Plus or minus 10 hours, but yeah. Hopefully my error margins are big enough.
Is it time yet to engage the Hype Howlitzer?
Maybe 4pm central... I hope!
Maxmaps' twitter implies they're doing the finishing touches.

duna bars. For science!

FOR SCIENCE!

*straps Duna bar powered boosters to the back*

FOR SCIENCE!! AND SPAAAAAACE!
